list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add meta tags for SEO and refine page content structure
Introduced meta description and keywords for improved SEO visibility. Updated existing sections with better CSS handling, standardized layout, and content clarity. Simplified project card descriptions and enhanced button styling for consistency.
Signed-off-by: Vojta Novak <vojtechnovak84@gmail.com>Update HTML structure and remove redundant styles.
Improved readability and maintainability of the HTML by reformatting meta tags, restructuring elements, and cleaning up inline comments. Removed unused styles and adjusted some text for brevity and clarity. Updated additional files for consistency.

task.summary:
Update styles and layout; add IDE workspace config
Increased height of graphic area in HTML for better layout. Changed text colors to black and removed shadows in CSS for improved readability. Added `.idea/workspace.xml` for local IDE configuration.

Add project pages, styles, and scripts for new projects
This commit creates new components for "Project 2" and "Project 3." It includes a CSS file for consistent styling, HTML structures for both projects, and JavaScript functionalities for forms and keyboard interaction. Additionally, modifies the main index.html to showcase these projects with a grid layout.

Add project files and update layout and scripts
Introduce project-specific IDE configurations under `.idea/`. Revise `index.html` to showcase updated project details and implement changes to `script.js` and `tesseract.js` for improved functionality. Clean up unused variables and refine layout for better user experience.

Update project files and improve layout and responsiveness
Refined layout and styling in `style.css` with new responsive designs, targeting various screen sizes. Revised project-specific configurations under `.idea/`, updated `index.html`, and optimized scripts for functionality and readability. These changes enhance user experience and adapt the application to be more mobile-friendly.

Add background music functionality and improve layout
Introduced a background music player to `index.html` and updated `script.js` to handle music playback after the preloader animation. Adjusted IDE configuration in `.idea/workspace.xml` and refined layout responsiveness for a better user experience.

Add theme toggle and implement dynamic theming variables
Introduced a theme toggle button in `index.html` to switch between light and dark modes. Refactored `style.css` to use CSS variables for theme-specific styles, enabling dynamic updates with smooth transitions. Updated various project files to enhance maintainability and user experience.

Add theme toggle and implement dynamic theming variables
Introduced a theme toggle button in `index.html` for switching between light and dark modes. Refactored `style.css` to leverage CSS variables, enabling smooth theme transitions. Updated project files to improve maintainability and enhance the user experience.

Fix typos and improve comments across multiple files
Resolved spelling and grammatical issues in comments and updated phrasing for clarity and consistency in `index.html`, `.idea/workspace.xml`, and `script.js`. These changes enhance code readability and maintainability without altering functionality.

Add README badges and improve documentation
Added a license badge, live demo link, and refined instructions in `README.md` for better usability and clarity. Adjusted formatting and structure to enhance readability and navigation.

Refactor and optimize CSS, improving maintainability
Updated CSS to enhance readability, maintainability, and UX. Consolidated comments, improved use of variables, and streamlined styles for better theme transitions and accessibility. Enhanced section layouts and responsiveness.

Remove unnecessary margin from header logo in CSS
Eliminated the `margin-right: auto` rule from the header logo style to simplify layout management. This improves consistency and reduces redundant styling for better maintainability.

Add meta tags for SEO and refine page content structure
Introduced meta description and keywords for improved SEO visibility. Updated existing sections with better CSS handling, standardized layout, and content clarity. Simplified project card descriptions and enhanced button styling for consistency.

Add meta tags for SEO and refine page content structure
Introduced meta description and keywords for improved SEO visibility. Updated existing sections with better CSS handling, standardized layout, and content clarity. Simplified project card descriptions and enhanced button styling for consistency.
Signed-off-by: Vojta Novak <vojtechnovak84@gmail.com>Update HTML structure and remove redundant styles.
Improved readability and maintainability of the HTML by reformatting meta tags, restructuring elements, and cleaning up inline comments. Removed unused styles and adjusted some text for brevity and clarity. Updated additional files for consistency.
